content.question: Craig walks from outside on a bright sunny day into a dark movie theater. Which of the following types of cells are initially responsible for his adaptation to the darker space?

choices.label: Glial cells, which are responsible for the process of light adaptation
Ganglion cells, which are responsible for processing visual information and transmitting it to the brain
Rods, which are responsible for adaptation to different light levels
Interneurons, which are responsible for processing perceptual information in the brain

content.answer: Rods, which are responsible for adaptation to different light levels
